resources.name: Group:x_*
resources.displayName: Consumer groups that start with x_

resources.name: kafka-cluster:my-cluster,Group:b_*
resources.displayName: Consumer groups on cluster my-cluster that start with b_

policies.name: Dev Team A
Default Policy
policies.description: A policy that grants access only for users within this realm

config.code:
// by default, grants any permission associated with this policy
$evaluation.grant();

policies.name: Dev Team B
Ops Team
ClusterManager Group
ClusterManager of my-cluster Group
Dev Team A owns topics that start with a_ on any cluster
Dev Team A can write to topics that start with x_ on any cluster
Dev Team A can do IdempotentWrites on cluster my-cluster
Dev Team B owns topics that start with b_ on cluster my-cluster
Dev Team B can do IdempotentWrites on cluster my-cluster
Dev Team B owns groups that start with b_ on cluster my-cluster
Dev Team B can read from topics that start with x_ on any cluster
Dev Team B can update consumer group offsets that start with x_ on any cluster
Dev Team A can use consumer groups that start with a_ on any cluster
ClusterManager of my-cluster Group has full access to topics on my-cluster
ClusterManager of my-cluster Group has full access to consumer groups on my-cluster
ClusterManager of my-cluster Group has full access to cluster config on my-cluster
ClusterManager Group has full access to manage and affect groups
ClusterManager Group has full access to manage and affect topics
ClusterManager Group has full access to cluster config
